abstract: Sam Querrey earns his eighth ATP Tour title by defeating Rajeev Ram at Delray Beach Open in Florida; other tennis news noted.

headline.print_headline: Querrey Beats Countryman for First Title Since 2012
headline.main: Sam Querrey Beats Rajeev Ram in Delray Beach Open

snippet: Sam Querrey beat Rajeev Ram, 6-4, 7-6 (8-6), in an all-American final in the Delray Beach Open in Florida for his eighth ATP Tour title and his first since 2012.
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey beat Rajeev Ram, 6-4, 7-6 (8-6), in an all-American final in the Delray Beach Open in Florida for his eighth ATP Tour title and his first since 2012.
